name: Open Source Design. Designing With The Community.
description:
These are the slides from my talk at Config 2020 around Open Source Design and Designing With The Community. Below is an excerpt from the talk.

What if all of your design ideas (good and bad) were made public? That's exactly what we did, and it changed our culture. Come hear how the Visual Studio Code team invited the community into the design process and embraced open source design.
